main event: A bright, circular white object was observed over Miami, Florida on December 14, 1952.
interesting points: The object was estimated to be approximately 30 feet in diameter.
The object was observed for approximately 2-3 minutes before suddenly disappearing.
The object was estimated to be traveling at a speed of 600-800 mph at an altitude of approximately 1,500 feet.
The weather conditions were clear with good visibility at the time of the sighting.
The object could not be identified at the time of the report.
